Performance:
November 1971: Tametomo The Archer General

Production: November 1971

Play: Tametomo The Archer General (椿説弓張月)

Scenes:

Oshima Island in Izu Province (伊豆国大嶋 / Izunokuni Ōshima)

Shiramine in Sanuki Province (讃岐国白峯 / Sanukinokuni Shiramine)

Mt. Kihara in Higo Province (肥後国木原山山塞 / Higonokuni Kiharasan sansai)

The Sea off Satsuma (薩南海上 / Satsunan kaisho)

Kitadani Ceremonial Site in Ryukyu (琉球国北谷斎場 / Ryūkyūkoku Kitadani saijō)

The Inn at Kitadani (北谷夫婦宿 / Kitadani myōtoyado)

The Unten Beach (運天海浜宵宮 / Unten kaihin yomiya)

Characters:

Tametomo (Chinzei Hachirō Tametomo / 鎮西八郎為朝)

Kiheiji (Hacchō Tsubuteno Kiheijidayū / 八町礫紀平治太夫)

Takama (Takamono Tarō Motoakira / 高間太郎原鑑)

Sasarae (Sasarae / 簓江)

Isohagi (Isohagi / 磯萩)

Tameyori (Tameyori / 為頼)

Shimagimi (Shimagimi / 島君)

Spy (Shinobi / 忍び)

Mutoda (Mutōda / 武藤太)

Ghost of retired Emperor Sutoku (Sutoku Jōkō no rei / 崇徳上皇の霊)

Ghost of Yorinaga (Sadaijin Yorinaga no rei / 左大臣頼長の霊)

Ghost of Tameyoshi (Rokujō Hangan Tameyoshi no rei / 六条判官為義の霊)

Crow (Karasu Tengu / 烏天狗)

Shiranui (Shiranui Hime / 白縫姫)

Chigusa, a maid (Koshimoto Chigusa / 腰元千種)

Yamahagi, a maid (Koshimoto Yamahagi / 腰元山萩)

Takihei, a servant (Rōdō Takihei / 郎党滝平)

Sutemaru (Shunten, later known as Sutemaru) (Sutemaru nochini Shuntenō / 舜天丸後に舜天王)

Riyu (Shikinkan Riyū / 紫巾官利勇)

Wanzu (Wanzu / 王子)

Neiwannyo (Neiwannyo / 寧王女)

Kumagimi (Miko Kumagimi / 巫女阿公)

Tsuru (Tsuru / 鶴)

Kame (Kame / 亀)
